itemInfo.itemDesc: Armor worn by tough warriors. Morale boosting proverbs are written inside the armor.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Steel Taritas Gloves

item.name: Taritas Gloves
item.desc: Armor worn by tough warriors. Morale boosting proverbs are written inside the armor.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Steel Taritas Gloves

item.name: Grade 1 Armor Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 1st-grade armor upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Taritas Gloves of Agility
item.desc: Energy of agility is contained within this Taritas Gloves\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Steel Taritas Gloves of Agility, Taritas Gloves of Agility, Steel Taritas Gloves, Taritas Gloves

item.name: Taritas Gloves
item.desc: Armor worn by tough warriors. Morale boosting proverbs are written inside the armor.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Steel Taritas Gloves

item.name: Taritas Gloves of Iron Wall
item.desc: Energy of iron wall is contained within this Taritas Gloves\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Steel Taritas Gloves of Iron Wall, Taritas Gloves of Iron wall, Steel Taritas Gloves, Taritas Gloves

item.name: Ultimate Taritas Gloves
item.desc: Taritas Gloves with maximum potential\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Every Taritas Gloves

item.name: Taritas Gloves of Intimidation
item.desc: Energy of intimidation is contained within this Taritas Gloves\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Taritas Gloves of Duress, Taritas Gloves
